sections.heading: 01|Acquisition, holding, and sale of exempt property by cemetery associations
sections.text: Effective:September 29, 2017Latest Legislation:House Bill 49 - 132nd General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFA company or association incorporated for cemetery purposes may appropriate or otherwise acquire, and may h

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not apply to a corporation or cemetery association owning a cemetery smaller than four acres and situated within one mile of the corporate limits of a municipal corporation
